SELECT c.CHAT_NO, c.CHAT_ROOM_NO, c.WRITER_ID, c.MESSAGE, c.IS_READ, c.CREATE_DATE, c.CHAT_TIME FROM CHAT c JOIN CHAT_ROOM cr ON c.CHAT_ROOM_NO = cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO WHERE cr.USER1_ID = #{userId} OR cr.USER2_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY c.CHAT_TIME DESC
